Reviews.Title: PHONE -GOOD CONDITION
Reviews.Author: outlebe
Reviews.Content: I NEVER REALISED THE PHONE COMES WITHOUT A SIM. IT IS NOT ABLE TO WORK IN THE CARIBBEAN. SO IF YOU BUYING THIS PHONE IS ONLY FOR THE AMERICA NETWORK..THIS PHONE IS A CDMA.

Reviews.Title: Good but.......
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: This phone was in good condition but was not able to work in my country...advise ensure you have all the info so you would not be at a loset..but I was please with the product just didn't get to enjoy the use of it.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: I ordered a phone from the seller and received it very fast, it seems i had just ordered it and it was at the door.  The phone was in very good condition just as described, very nice person.  I would definitely buy from this person again.  Angie

Reviews.Title: NO REPLY FROM SELLER !!!!!!
Reviews.Author: annie
Reviews.Content: I ORDER THIS PHONE IN NOV. 1 I THINK AND GOT IT NOV 17 AND  ITS SEEN TO BE OK AND BY DEC 6 I THINK THE PHONE STARTED MESSING UP I TRIED TO CONTACT THE SELLER COULD NOT GET A ANSWER  SO I E-MAILED HIM AND STILL DID NOT GET A REPLY SO WITH THAT BEING SAID IM STUCK WITH A PHONE THAT WORKS LIKE IT WANT TO ... AND NOBODY CAN HEAR A THING I BE SAYING SO BEFORE U BUY ONE THINK ABOUT IT U COME OUT BETTER GOING TO STORE AND BUY ONE !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste you money
Reviews.Author: Ashley Marie
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smart phone and found this one and thought.. "Hey, that's an awesome price." It DIED after 2 months. It was a complete waste of money!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: nika
Reviews.Content: mr.a is so sweet,really cares about the customer he is not satisfied until you are very nice person and will always and only buy from mr.a he is the best

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
Access V Cast Music (with Rhapsody) and Video services via fast EV-DO data network; GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions; Visual Voice Mail.
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; digital audio player syncs with iTunes and Windows Media Player.
Offer Includes - BlackBerry Curve 8530 Smartphone (Minor Scratches and/or Blemishes), Battery, and Wall Charger.
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 8530 Smartphone (Black) for Alltel Wireless Network with No Contract (Good Condition)
